    {quartostamp}

    <<<<<<< HEAD An R package containing an RStudio Addin to insert useful little divs and classes for documents made with Quarto.

    Why ‘quartostamp’? You can physically stamp some pre-written type into a literal quarto document; you can digitally stamp some pre-written elements into your qmd file.

    See the:

    • package website for the full list of available functions
    • Quarto website for full documentation

    To install this package, run the following and then restart RStudio:

    install.packages("remotes")  # if not yet installed
remotes::install_github("matt-dray/quartostamp")

    To use:

    1. Put the cursor in your Quarto file where you’d like to insert a div or class
    2. Click the ‘RStudio Addins’ dropdown at the top of the RStudio IDE
    3. Scroll/search for ‘QUARTOSTAMP’ and click the function you want
